content.text: Hi, I'm from Colorado! How are you?
I'm doing well, thanks for asking! I'm from California. How's the weather in Colorado?
It's been pretty nice lately, but it's been a little chilly at night.
I love the cold weather, I'm a big fan of snow!
Yeah, I love the snow too! It's so pretty.
I know! What are some of your favorite things to do in Colorado?
I love to go hiking and skiing. I also love to visit all the different breweries.
Those sound like so much fun! I've always wanted to go skiing.
You should definitely come to Colorado sometime! We have some of the best skiing in the country.
I will definitely have to do that! I'm also a big fan of music. Do you listen to any music from Colorado?
I love the Lumineers! They're from Colorado.
Yes! I love them too! I'm a big fan of their music.
They're one of my favorite bands.
Me too! I'm glad we have something in common.
Me too! It's always nice to meet someone who likes the same music.
Yeah, it is! I'm glad we met.
